import React, { Component } from 'react' export class Forms extends Component { constructor() { super() this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) this.state = { nome:'', email: '', cpf: '', endereço: '', cidade: '', estado: '', CasaApto: false, cv:'', job:'', jobdescription:'' } } handleChange({target}) { const {name} = target const value = target.type === 'checkbox' ? target.checked : target.value this.setState({ [name]: value }); } render() { return (
